description: The '''Dlamini King Brothers''' are an [[isicathamiya]] [[choir]] from the [[Kennedy Road, Durban|Kennedy Road]] shack settlement in [[Durban]], [[South Africa]]. They were formed in 1999 and have won several awards. In January 2009 they released their début album ''Hlis’uMoya'' which contains a mixture of religious and political songs. They often perform at events organised by the squatter's movement [[Abahlali baseMjondolo]] and have written songs for the group.
